verifiable-credential-create.subjectJsonFileNotFound: The subject JSON file was not found.

proof-create.documentJsonFileNotFound: The document JSON file was not found.
proof-create.proofJsonFileNotFound: The proof JSON file was not found.

seed.description: The seed for the controller address in hex or base64 used to create the DID, or start with ! to read environment variable.

addressIndex.description: The address index to use for the creation.

did.description: The identifier to resolve, or start with ! to read environment variable.

verification-method-add.summary: Add a verification method to a DID.
verification-method-add.description: Add a verification method to a DID.

seed.description: The seed for the private key for the controller address of the document in hex or base64, or start with ! to read environment variable.

did.description: The identifier to add the verification method to, or start with ! to read environment variable.

type.description: The type of verification method to add.

id.description: The optional id of verification method to add, if not provided one will be generated.

verification-method-remove.summary: Remove a verification method from a DID.
verification-method-remove.description: Remove a verification method from a DID.

seed.description: The seed for the private key for the controller address of the document in hex or base64, or start with ! to read environment variable.

did.description: The identifier to remove the verification method from, or start with ! to read environment variable.

id.description: The id of verification method to remove.

service-add.summary: Add a service to a DID.
service-add.description: Add a service to a DID.

seed.description: The seed for the private key for the controller address of the document in hex or base64, or start with ! to read environment variable.

did.description: The identifier to add the service to, or start with ! to read environment variable.

id.description: The id of service to add, if not provided one will be generated.

type.description: The type of service to add.

service-remove.summary: Remove a service from a DID.
service-remove.description: Remove a service from a DID.

seed.description: The seed for the private key for the controller address of the document in hex or base64, or start with ! to read environment variable.

id.description: The id of service to remove.
The full verification method id including did, or start with ! to read environment variable.

private-key.description: The private key for the verification method id, in either hex or base64 form, or start with ! to read environment variable.

credential-id.description: The credential id which uniquely identifies the credential.

subject-json.description: A JSON-LD file to read which includes the data for the verifiable credential.

revocation-index.description: The revocation index in the issuing document to use if revoking the credential.

jwt.description: The verifiable credential as a JSON web token to verify, or start with ! to read environment variable.

seed.description: The seed for the private key for the controller address of the document in hex or base64, or start with ! to read environment variable.

did.description: The did of the document to revoke the index from, or start with ! to read environment variable.

revocation-index.description: The revocation index of the credential revoke.

seed.description: The seed for the private key for the controller address of the document in hex or base64, or start with ! to read environment variable.

did.description: The did of the document to unrevoke the index from, or start with ! to read environment variable.

revocation-index.description: The revocation index of the credential unrevoke.

proof-create.summary: Create a proof for some data using a verification method.
proof-create.description: Create a proof for some data using a verification method.

id.description: The full verification method id including did, or start with ! to read environment variable.

private-key.description: The private key for the verification method id, in either hex or base64 form, or start with ! to read environment variable.

document-filename.description: The filename of a JSON-LD document to create the proof for.

proof-verify.summary: Verify a proof for some data using a verification method.
proof-verify.description: Verify a proof for some data using a verification method.

document-filename.description: The filename of a JSON-LD document to create the proof for.

proof-filename.description: The filename of the proof JSON.

connector.description: The connector to use for the identity operation.

node.description: The url for the node endpoint, or an environment variable name containing the url.

network.description: The network to use for the identity operation.
